ResearchProjectDef.label: <color=#84b0e0>Animal Prosthetics</color>
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks construction of an animal lab, allowing to make simple animal prostheses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: <color=#828ddd>Animal Bionics</color>
ResearchProjectDef.description: The research unlocks advanced bionic parts and organs for animals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: <color=#d3308f>Battle boosters</color>
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows to make body part battle boosters - enhancers which increase damage resistance of an animal by partly metallizing its bones and tissues.
